titles.title: A bill to provide that the great hall of the Capitol Visitor Center shall be known as Emancipation Hall.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.
Senate Committee on Rules and Administration discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 11/15/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates the great hall of the Capitol Visitor Center as Emancipation Hall.
